name: Inventory
description:
You're trapped in a dungeon with an Inventory full of stuff. Use what you've got to escape... if you can.

Written and designed by Joey Fu / @jozerphine.
Styled and developed by Conrad Kreyling / @konistehrad.
Created for Porpentine's Twiny Jam.
Mirrored at http://www.joeyfu.com/games/inv.html.
